## Mtcars

```{r plotly, comment = NA}
library(ggplot2)
library(plotly)

g <- ggplot(mtcars, aes(x = wt, y = mpg, col = factor(cyl))) +
    geom_point() +
    labs(x = "Weight", y = "Miles per Galon", colour = "Cylinders")

ggplotly(g)
```
